Constructor How many Spring Special and dozen Roses?

Parameters:
specialCount - consists of 1 vase, 3 rose, 6 carnation, and 4 daisy

Order

public Order(int vaseCount,
             int roseCount,
             int carnationCount,
             int daisyCount)
Constructor that gives a specified request for each individual flower from customer

Parameters:
vaseCount - is amount of vases a customer wants
roseCount - is amount of roses a customer wants
carnationCount - is amount of carnation a customer wants
daisyCount - is amount of daisy a customer wants
